General.Name: Visual China Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Visual China Group Co.,Ltd. operates a copyright trading platform that offers visual materials and customized value-added services for media, commercial, government enterprises, and institutions in China and internationally. The company operates through Internet Media and Others segments. It also provides digital entertainment solutions for theme parks, and urban complexes; advertising design and planning. Visual China Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Beijing, China.
